column2: COLORADO PRACTICE PERMIT TEST
column6: CO

column2: Question Text
column6: Answer2 Text

column2: 1. Which sign has white letters on a red background?
column6: Speed limit

column2: 2. If the entrance lane is too short to allow acceleration to highway speed, you should:
column4: go to the next entrance ramp.
column6: stop and wait for a large gap in traffic, then enter the highway and accelerate quickly.
column8: merge into highway traffic as soon as possible.

column2: 3. To avoid the risk of being involved in an alcohol-related crash, you should:
column4: decide before you start drinking that you are not going to drive.
column6: say “No, thanks" if someone offers you alcohol.
column8: call a taxi if you've been drinking.

column2: 4. What does a flashing yellow light mean?
column4: Drivers may move forward with caution.
column6: The same thing as a stop sign.

column2: 5. Highway hypnosis is a driving condition that can result from:
column6: staring at the roadway for long periods of time.

column2: 6. When an approaching driver at night blinds you by failing to dim their high beams, you should look:
column4: straight down the middle of the road.
column6: towards the left side of the road.
column8: None of the other answers is correct.
column10: towards the right side of the road.

column2: 7. When following motorcycles, drivers should:
column6: keep more space in front of their vehicle.
column8: keep less space in front of their vehicle.
column10: try to pass them as they have different braking capabilities than other motor vehicles.

column2: 8. What is the first thing you should do if your wheels move off the pavement?
column4: Try pumping the gas pedal to increase pressure.
column6: Ease your foot off the gas pedal and brake gently.
column10: Pull over to the right and sound your horn to warn the other drivers.

column2: 9. Speed limit signs are:
column6: destination signs (guide signs)

column2: 10. If you begin to feel drowsy while driving, you should:
column6: get some coffee.

column2: 11. What does a flashing red light mean?
column6: The same thing as a stop sign.
column10: Drivers may move forward with caution.

column2: 12. This road sign means:
column6: A four-way intersection is ahead
column10: A road joins from the right

column2: 13. The ‘One Way’ sign means that:
column4: only vehicles turning left may travel in the direction of the arrow.
column6: drivers may travel only in the direction of the arrow.
column8: there is only one road that turns left at the intersection.

column2: 14. If another car is in danger of hitting you, you should:
column6: flash your brake lights.

column2: 15. The minimum drinking age in this State is ____ years.
16. This sign means:
column4: The center lane is shared for left turns.
column6: Left turns in both directions of travel are not permitted.

column2: 17. At a light rail intersection, you should always:
column4: look both ways before crossing the tracks.
column6: be alert and obey all traffic signals.
column8: share the road with pedestrians and bicyclists.

column2: 18. ___________ are green with white letters and symbols.
column6: Regulation signs (regulatory signs)

column2: 19. In heavy rain, tires can begin to ride on the water that is on top of the road pavement. This is called:
column6: rideplaning.

column2: 20. To keep your vehicle from rolling into traffic when parked on a hill, if you are facing uphill you should:
column4: turn the front wheels away from the curb or edge of the road.
column6: turn the back wheels towards the curb or edge of the road.
column8: set the parking brake and keep the front wheels straight.
column10: turn the front wheels towards the curb or edge of the road.

column2: 21. This sign means:
column6: no turns are allowed on this road.
column10: the road may be slippery when wet.

column2: 22. This road sign means:
column6: No right turn

column2: 23. A steady yellow light at an intersection means:
column4: Proceed with caution through the intersection
column6: Slow down and be prepared to stop
column8: Immediately come to a complete stop

column2: 24. This road sign means:
column6: Slow down or stop

column2: 25. This road sign means:
column6: Sharp curve ahead
